programme.title: Muttons In The Morning - Justin Ang & Vernon A
programme.desc:
Wake up with Justin Ang & Vernon A, Muttons In The Morning! They'll drive you to work with lots of LOL, as they explore the lighter side of Singapore with you. Surprise birthday calls, spoof songs, big prizes and loads more fun stuff will get you to work with a smile.

Twitter : Class95FM

programme.title: Lunchbreak with Yasminne Cheng
programme.desc: Join your work & lunch buddy Yasminne Cheng for the lowdown on the best eats in town, interesting trivia, roll-your-eyes jokes and more. Let her brighten up your work day!

programme.title: Afternoons with Rai
programme.desc: Get over those sleepy weekday afternoons with Rai, cheering you past that post-lunch hump from 2-5pm with some Midday Motivation, music trivia and musings from Rai’s personal memoirs. Tune in to your Rai-dio!

programme.title: Homestretch with John Klass
programme.desc: Revitalize your evenings on the GOLD 905 airwaves with The Homestretch hosted by John Klass (Weekdays, 4pm to 8pm). programme.title: Nite Flite with Mr X
programme.desc: Rest and relaxation are the shows KPIs. All the night you need on GOLD 905's flying themed day-ender!

programme.title: Solid Gold
programme.desc:
Join resident DJ, DJ Boy as he spins retro hits for you to party and enjoy your Saturday evening!

DJ Boy is no stranger to the local club scene. You may recognize him on his DJ appearances at the top clubs in this region. From a humble start of spinning Retro and Top 40 club hits in the Singapore Club scene, to headlining humongous events, DJ Boy has become synonymous with every major dance music scene and movement in Singapore.

programme.title: The Vintage Showcase
programme.desc:
Some of the new features will include Brian's TOP 20 and Singapore Trivia with listeners' interaction. It will also encompass capsules likes SINGAPORE SNAPSHOTS, MOMENTS IN SINGAPORE HISTORY and REMINISING WITH. The latter will have special guests sharing a specific memory of their past.

There will also be a special request segment where a listener will share their memories which go with a special song.

programme.title: LIVE! With Mike , Vernetta & Pierre Png
programme.desc: Get ready for a fun packed morning on GOLD 905! LIVE! with Mike & Vernetta welcomes a new voice – local celebrity Pierre Png. Best known for his roles in Crazy Rich Asians and Phua Chu Kang, Pierre will join Mike Kasem and Vernetta Lopez every Monday and Tuesday from 8am to 10am, as part of their morning show timebelt from 6am to 10am. The new LIVE! with Mike, Vernetta & Pierre is set to bring fun banter, infectious energy, and plenty of laughs to kickstart your mornings!

programme.title: CNA News & Current Affairs Overnight
programme.desc: The latest from the CNA newsroom plus a showcase of the network’s award-winning current affairs programmes.

programme.title: Asia First with Andrea Heng and Hairianto Diman
programme.desc: Get your day off to a stellar start by catching up on what’s been happening across the world while you and much of Asia were asleep. From 7am to 10am, Monday to Friday, Asia First gets you clued in on everything you need to know to work and function well for the day ahead. Be a part of the conversation, on issues that affect your life and dealings both in Singapore and abroad.

programme.title: Work It with Chew Wui Lynn and Cheryl Goh
programme.desc: Every weekday from 10am to 2pm, make it your business to hear how the right moves can get your money, your career and your company ahead of the competition. programme.title: Your Singapore Weekend with Susan Ng
programme.desc: We take a deep dive into everything that makes a Singapore weekend GREAT! programme.title: Sun 天 Sun 夜 (Sunday, Sun Yay!)
programme.desc:
周末结束前的夜晚，Kevin 小蔡陪你整理思绪，收拾心情。《Sun 天 Sun 夜》，犹如你的心境转换站，以阳光为你充电，迎接全新的一周!

Kevin 小蔡 is a radio producer and part-time presenter with YES 933. 
Kevin participated in Mediacorp's YES 933 Hey DJ! Competition, where he emerged 3rd placing for the NTU category. An extroverted introvert, Kevin enjoys travelling alone, running, eating gummies and all things Disney. Kevin currently hosts the Sunday radio programme, Sun天Sun夜, from 8pm – 10pm on YES 933. On weekdays, he also helms the segments “招牌蔡” and “小蔡一碟” on the evening radio programme 双节坤.

programme.desc: 以轻松幽默的方式带出国内外新闻以及娱乐讯息；一起开心学双语，还有逗趣的嘉宾访问！让4位风格鲜明的主持人说说唱唱，陪你度过周一到周五早上6点到11点的快乐时光。亲切、搞笑、充满正能量的欢乐早班，绝对是我们 "玉建煌崇"！

programme.desc:

programme.desc:
